parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post information.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions "Constantin Fierăscu", identifying him as a USR candidate for the Chamber of Deputies in Teleorman. This directly refers to a parliamentary candidate, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True.  The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, aiming to reach a wide audience beyond personal communication. The reach estimate (100K - 500K) further supports this.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The primary objective of the post is to promote Constantin Fierăscu's candidacy. The image and text ("Teormaneni in Parlament!") directly encourage voters to support him in the parliamentary elections. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. The post lacks the characteristics of journalistic reporting. It doesn't present news, analysis, or opinions in an objective manner. Instead, it's promotional material designed to influence voters' choices.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clear endorsement of a political candidate.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1923042014830768</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post promotes Constantin Fierăscu, a USR candidate for the Chamber of Deputies in Teleorman.  The post uses an image and text explicitly designed to encourage voters to support him. The paid nature of the advertisement on a public platform indicates an intention to reach a wide audience. While the post doesn't contain explicit calls to vote, the visual and textual elements clearly aim to influence voters' choices in the parliamentary elections.  The post fulfills all criteria of electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.  The end date of the advertisement (1732953600) needs to be checked against the official end date of the electoral campaign to determine if it violates Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015. If the campaign has ended, this post is a violation.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate>
    <name>Constantin Fierăscu</name>
    <impact>POSITIVE</impact>
  </candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>Total Impact</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Total Impact, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 1923042014830768) care promovează candidatura lui Constantin Fierăscu pentru USR la Camera Deputaților în Teleorman, cu imagini și text menite să influențeze votul alegătorilor.  Reclama, având o estimare a audienței de 100.000 - 500.000 de persoane, îndeplinește toate criteriile propagandei electorale conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGEA nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006,  având ca efect electoral creșterea numărului de voturi pentru candidatul menționat.  În cazul în care campania electorală s-a încheiat, această postare constituie o încălcare clară a legii.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
